casebody.data:
HALLIBURTON CO., et al., petitioners,
v.
ERICA P. JOHN FUND, INC., fka Archdiocese of Milwaukee Supporting Fund, Inc. No. 13-317. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 15, 2013.

Case below, 718 F.3d 423.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted.
